mapper.insert: insert into coupon (id, coupon_password, redeem_score, coupon_count, coupon_money, validity, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redeemScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{validity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_password = #{couponPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, redeem_score = #{redeemScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coupon_count = #{couponCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coupon_money = #{couponMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, validity = #{validity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, coupon_password, redeem_score, coupon_count, coupon_money, validity, create_time, update_time from coupon where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
